Docs.param: Gets the length of weights and bias array. For binary classification and regression, this is 1. For multi-class classification, this equals the number of classes on the label.
Docs.summary: This method ensures that the data meets the requirements of this trainer and its subclasses, injects necessary transforms, and throws if it couldn't meet them.
